name: Mori Adventures
description:
Join a little silkworm in her adventurous journey. Explore the floating islands world and find a cure for her sick mother. Solve riddles to discover secret paths and uncover the dangers and wonders of this world.

Mori Adventures is a 3D puzzle platformer. The main goals is to find all ingredients needed for a curing potion for their mother. 

The player progresses by solving puzzles, which are based on interactions with objects around the island or paths hidden within the environment. The game involves the exploration of an open world made of multiple islands. 

This indie-game is my second semester university project.  I've never done programming before, so It's my first experience making something like that! 
The folder contains as ReadMe file with a detailed walkthrough and explanation where to go and what to do, if you're stuck.
